name: Pet Guardian: The Idle RPG
description:
Pet Guardian: The Idle RPG is a game that lets you take on the role of a pet guardian. That has to protect the boss from the invasion of the nyarlathotep who brings the force of the lovecraftian to disturb our boss's sleep time, where we have to cooperate with the things in the bedroom that transformed into a companion. protect our master!!

-Autobattle: You can enjoy battles with various skill effects and companion whose stuff in the room turn into cute little creatures to help you fight.

-Cute: I know you guys like animals and animals are cute right?, Your side is full of cute main characters and companion. Power up to make them prettier.

-Lovecraftion:The evil Nyarlathotep bring many of Lovecraftian to disturb your master's sleep. Protect your master from the Lovecraft invasion.

-Gacha: What is indispensable is to level up, with Gacha focusing on leveling up skills and assistants. The more you upgrade, the better they become, and most importantly, the CUTER.
